ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Just the Kwama
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
The kwama faction separated from MorrowRim, now completely standalone.

Inaccessible kwama eggmines will generate on the world map. Settling near an eggmine on tiles with caves will have a random chance to generate kwama nests instead of insectoid hives, based on distance from the eggmine. The kwama will remain peaceful, unless threatened. If they are threatened they will aggressively defend their nest, returning to a peaceful state after a period of time. The nest entrances will periodically spawn kwama egg sacs, that can be deconstructed for kwama eggs.

-Requires Harmony.
-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Do not use at the same time as MorrowRim.
Can be used at the same time as MorrowRim - Just the Animals.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
